greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = (1/(n+1)) * Sum_{k=0..n} A185072(n-k)*A185072(k).
comment: Does this sequence consist entirely of integers?
The g.f. G(x) of A185072 satisfies [x^(n+1)] G(x)^(n^2+1) = 0 for n>0.
link: Paul D. Hanna, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
example: where the coefficient of x^n in G(x)^2 appears to be divisible by (n+1) for n>=0.
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Sep 14 2013
